caption.p: Glycan structures attached to Asn54 (upper panel) and Asn87 (lower panel) of the CU44 HA. The 2|F o| − |F c| electron density contoured at 1.0 σ and polder omit difference electron density contoured at 3.0 σ (in blue mesh) and at 3.5 σ (in brown mesh). The glycans are closer to the Zn 2+ binding site than other glycans in the head region. The monosaccharide units are shown in stick representations. The figures were created using PyMOL ( https://www.pymol.org/).
